message:
Chatbot: Good morning! How's your glucose level today?

You: Oh, good morning! Well, I had a bit of a rough night, so my pre-meal glucose was a bit higher than usual. It was 145 mg/dL, to be exact. I've been feeling a bit stressed lately, and I think that might have contributed to it. I'll try to be more mindful of my

Chatbot: Hi there! How's your day going? I see you've got an update for me regarding your medications. Go ahead and share the details.

You: Oh, hi there! Yeah, I took my metformin this morning as usual, 1000mg with breakfast. No side effects today, thankfully. But, I have to admit, I missed my evening dose last night. I was just so tired after work and forgot all

Chatbot: Good evening! I see you'd like to log a glucose update. Could you please specify the value, the time, and any factors that might have influenced your reading?

You: (sighs) Well, it's 19:58, and my glucose is 120 mg/dL, I guess. I had a small snack an hour ago, just a handful of pretzels, but
